Articles.Content: When building crafts that have engines that aren't always in use (i.e. a hovercraft with downward facing engines as well as engines to propel it forward), it's difficult to align CG and CT (center of thrust) correctly due to the aforementioned engines figuring into the CT calculation. It would be nice to have the ability to 'toggle' whether an engine is included in the CT calculation.
You can simply tweak the Thrust Limit to zero of any engine you don't want to have factored into the calculation. That's what I do in those situations. Just remember to reset it before launch!
